enrollAUserIntoACource.displayName: Enroll a User Into a Course
enrollAUserIntoACource.description: Enroll a user into a course by user email or user ID

enrollAUserIntoAUserGroup.displayName: Enroll a User Into a User Group
enrollAUserIntoAUserGroup.description: Enroll a user into a user group by user email or user ID

props.name: user_identifier
props.description: Choose whether to identify the user by email or ID

props.name: user_email
props.description: The email address of the user to enroll

props.name: user_group_id
props.description: The ID of the user group to enroll the user into

props.name: user_group_enrollment_expiration_date
props.description: Optional: The date when the enrollment will expire (e.g., "2024-12-31")

updateUser.description: Update user information. Omitted parameters will not be updated.

props.name: user_email
props.description: The email address of the user to update (required)

props.name: first_name
props.description: The first name of the user

props.name: last_name
props.description: The last name of the user

props.name: cell
props.description: The cell phone number of the user

props.name: work_phone
props.description: The work phone number of the user

props.name: card_no
props.description: The unique user identifier (e.g. student #, badge #)

props.name: email_notifications
props.description: Whether the user receives email notifications

props.name: sms_notifications
props.description: Whether the user receives SMS notifications (requires Twilio integration)

props.name: access_start_date
props.description: The date when the user can start accessing content (e.g., "July 31, 2015")

props.name: access_end_date
props.description: The date when the user can no longer access content (e.g., "July 30, 2017")

props.name: password_expiration_date
props.description: The date when the user password expires (e.g., "July 19, 2022")

courceFailed.description: Trigger when a user fails a course

courcePassed.description: Trigger when a user passes a course

newUser.description: Trigger when a new user is created in SkyPrep
